name: In the Shadows (itch) (Ohmygiggles)
description:
In the Shadows is a 1-bit atmospheric horror game following a woman that has been tasked with a simple request: “Bring him the key.” The home is familiar, however, there is someone or something lurking in the shadows. Will you do as you’re told or will you be swallowed up in ignorance?

Game features numerous endings, as well as multiple solutions. Avoid being caught up in the silence, or be faced with the mysterious lurker.

Search your surroundings to uncover the truth. 

Game contains allusions to violence and disturbing situations. Not intended for children. 

Credits
